item.title: Atomic Habits
item.description: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones through small, incremental changes.

item.title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
item.description: The definitive guide to understanding the architecture of modern data systems, covering reliability, scalability, and maintainability.
